source_caption_data.pre_caption: This scenery video features a slow pan to the left across a quiet residential street corner in Japan. The shot begins on the entrance of a traditional-style house before revealing more of the neighborhood, including lush greenery and a street mirror. The scene is set on a bright, sunny day.

The shot begins on the entrance of a traditional-style house before revealing more of the neighborhood, including lush greenery and a street mirror. The scene is set on a bright, sunny day.
